patthana24.16:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.16:2.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.16:3.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.16:4.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
